AboutUs.description_1: Our company offers the services of using professional writers who have extensive experience in writing student papers. In addition, we guarantee complete confidentiality and security of your personal data and order information.
AboutUs.join_to_teem_description: Student Helper is a good way to increase your income, work from home at a time convenient for you. Fill out the performer form and say goodbye to the same type of work on the 5/2 schedule forever!
AboutUs.advance_description: We provide quality writing services for students at affordable prices. Our main goal is to satisfy the needs of customers who value quality highly, without going beyond financial constraints.
AboutUs.description_2: We are a leading provider of writing services for various types of student papers such as essays, essays, term papers, theses and more.
AboutUs.details_via_Telegram: The consultant clarifies      the details via Telegram

OffersData.question_1_1: From which disciplines can works be ordered?
OffersData.description_1_1: The Student Helper exchange offers help in all subjects of universities and other educational institutions. Registered authors are not at all afraid of complications and will make every effort to write your work at the highest level.
OffersData.question_1_2: Why are our works as unique as possible?
OffersData.description_1_2: We offer to order a work that is written to an individual order, and the basis will be actual and popular sources. Before sending to the client, the work must be checked for anti-plagiarism. Even the urgency of the order will not affect the quality.
OffersData.question_1_3: Can I ask questions during the work?
OffersData.description_1_3: Can I ask questions during the work?
OffersData.description_1_4: Exchange consultants are experienced craftsmen. Among them are teachers, graduate students, university graduates with red diplomas. They have the theory and practice of their subject, which allows them to write the best commissioned works for our clients.
OffersData.description_2_1: Yes, we have made this decision in order to offer you the best value for money on the market. You can order a term paper online or a thesis and much more from us.
OffersData.question_2_2: What does the cost of work depend on?
OffersData.description_2_2: First of all, the cost depends on the complexity and type of work. The duration of the work is significantly affected, the shorter it is, the higher the cost of the work. The amount of work is also important.
OffersData.question_2_3: How quickly will my application be processed?
OffersData.description_2_3: Our operators are online from 9 am to 6 pm, we try to process all requests in no more than 15 minutes. But in some cases, the evaluation of the work may take a long time, which we will immediately warn you about.
OffersData.description_2_4:
Yes of course. We correct all comments FREE of charge according to the approved work plan/task.
***We do not make corrections free of charge if the initial conditions of the task have changed after the approval and execution of the work.
OffersData.question_3_1: Do you work in technical disciplines?
OffersData.description_3_1: Yes, we perform the entire range of technical disciplines.
OffersData.question_3_2: Who writes your custom papers for students?
OffersData.description_3_2: Who writes your papers for students to order? Our papers are done by graduate students and teachers. All our specialists have long-term experience in the field of student works.
OffersData.question_3_3: How does the Student Help exchange differ from other agencies and firms?
OffersData.description_3_3: How does the Student Help exchange differ from other agencies and firms?
OffersData.question_3_4: How does the Student Help exchange differ from other agencies and firms?
OffersData.description_3_4: Certified specialists, professionals with many years of experience and many successfully completed projects are registered on the site. Many authors have degrees and know how to work with the most complex topics. All projects are written without using ready-made texts from the Internet and pass Anti-plagiarism.
OffersData.question_4_1: Are you 100% prepaid or considering other options?
OffersData.description_4_1: The site works on prepayment - 50% of the cost of the order. We have a 7-day warranty period, so you can take your time and carefully check the work. We provide free consultations, and if necessary, the author will make revisions and make corrections. In the process of performing the work, the author is in contact with the client, takes into account his requirements and wishes.
OffersData.question_4_2: On which anti-plagiarism do you check works?
OffersData.description_4_2: All works of our authors are checked by anti-plagiarism eTXT (Antiplagiarism) and at the request of the client by Unicheck or StrikePlagitarism. Many companies and freelancers do not work with these programs, as they are the most demanding in Ukraine and cannot be circumvented by fraudulent methods. At the client's request, we are ready to check his work on any anti-plagiarism tool, as we are confident in the quality of our work.
OffersData.question_4_3: How many years have we been providing this kind of service?
OffersData.description_4_3: We have been working since 2020, so we already have enough experience on how to do the work so that it satisfies both the client and the teacher.
OffersData.question_4_4: In which currency can I pay?
OffersData.description_4_4: It is preferable to pay for student work in hryvnias, but it is possible in all currencies through SWIFT payments or in another convenient way for you.
OffersData.question_5_1:
How to specify job requirements correctly?
It is better to specify the requirements, it is to specify and provide all the data you have. As a rule, verified in practice, such data are sufficient.
OffersData.question_5_2: The work does not suit me and I need to redo it ...
OffersData.description_5_2:
If you are not satisfied with the work we have done, it can be redone.
                All revisions and modifications are absolutely free until the protection itself. That's right, we accompany all our works to protection, and revisions are performed in an instant, in a short time, that is, revision of your work becomes a priority over other unfulfilled orders of the author.
                Finishing work rarely happens with us, since all work is of the highest quality, but let's not lie, it still happens.
                We ask you not to worry about this issue, we will fix everything, as you and your teacher need.
OffersData.question_5_3: What exactly is possible to redo in the work, if it was not accepted by the teacher?
OffersData.description_5_3:
It is possible to correct absolutely everything in the revision of the work, but the main thing is that these revisions do not conflict with the requirements previously specified by you.
                For example, when you ordered, you indicated that the term paper should be 30-35 pages long, and in the comments before revision, you said that the term paper should already be 60 pages long, and you need to pay extra for such revisions.
                Or another example, you ordered a coursework on one topic, and then you indicated that your topic is completely different, the same also applies to the plan (content), which the client provides himself, or we do (and the client must approve independently or in teacher).
                As a rule, this does not happen at all, but sometimes it can happen, so we warn you in advance so that there are no misunderstandings between us, IC "KURSOVIKS" and you, as the customer.
OffersData.question_5_4: How can I be sure that after full payment you will redo the work?
OffersData.description_5_4:
We guarantee that you will successfully defend your work. A month after full payment, a year or any time later, rest assured, we will remember you and your work will be redone.
                This is one of the advantages and features of our service.
OffersData.description_6_1:
Sometimes clients ask us where our office is located?
                The answer is always the same, we don't have office space because we don't need it. The office is an additional expense that will affect the price of the work. And we have such a type of activity that it is possible to work quickly and conveniently only online, and we drop off your orders or by mail. We work throughout Ukraine, so we cannot open an office in all regions, and even more so in all cities, and there is no need for this.
OffersData.question_6_2: What is the uniqueness of our works?
OffersData.description_6_2:
The uniqueness of the work is chosen by the client himself when ordering the work, you specify any uniqueness, as a rule, it is 70% (standard for all educational institutions). We can fulfill any % of originality and the work will pass any plagiarism check system.
                If you need work with uniqueness (as a rule, theses, scientific articles, theses and essays), please specify the required uniqueness and the anti-plagiarism program (Ethkt, Antiplagiat.ru, Advego and many others). Different programs have different algorithms for determining uniqueness, and it can happen that in one program the uniqueness will be 90%, and in another 50%, so this is very important.
OffersData.question_6_3: Who should I contact to find out details about my work (what stage the work is at, etc.)?
OffersData.description_6_3: You can contact us using any of the contact methods listed on our website.
OffersData.question_6_4: What types of student works do we perform to order?
OffersData.description_6_4: We perform absolutely all types of student work: from a report to a master's thesis, so be sure that your work will be done with us, and not just, but qualitatively and professionally.
OffersData.description_7_1: You can order work urgently, we write diploma theses from 3 days, we write term papers from 2 days, the price in this case is formed individually before the request and there will also be an extra charge for urgency. Our managers are on call 7 days a week, so we can quickly calculate the price of your request and start working as soon as possible.

OffersData.question_8_1: How to find out the cost?
OffersData.description_8_1:
In order to find out the price of the order, fill out the form on the website or contact our managers.
                Within 15 minutes, the manager will process your request, agree on all the details of the order and set the price.
OffersData.question_8_2: Do we write in other languages?
OffersData.question_8_3: Is it possible to order in parts?
OffersData.description_8_3:
Is it possible to order in parts?
                You can make an order as it is convenient and necessary for you.
                Having received a professionally executed section or part, you will be convinced of the high qualification of our employees and become our regular customer, for whom additional discounts are provided.
OffersData.question_8_4: Are there any promotions or discounts?
OffersData.description_8_4:
All new and regular customers receive personal discounts.
                Their size is determined by the manager, taking into account the terms and requirements.
                There are also additional discounts when placing several orders independently or together with group mates.
OffersData.question_9_1: What are the deadlines for writing a practice report?
OffersData.description_9_1: The term paper is written within 5-7 days. It is possible to perform the work in an accelerated mode - from the 1st day, but this requires additional coordination with the author. We have a successful experience of writing term papers urgently without loss of quality.
OffersData.question_9_2: If the manager comments on the practice report, will the revisions be paid?
OffersData.description_9_2: If the manager comments on the performance report, will the revisions be paid?
OffersData.question_9_3: If I don't have a method and a plan, will you take my order into work?
OffersData.description_9_3: Yes, first we will write a course plan for you for approval with the academic supervisor. After that, according to the approved plan, our author will write a unique and competent coursework.
OffersData.question_9_4: Will the practice report have the required level of uniqueness?
OffersData.description_9_4: Yes, we check all works in the Internet Antiplagiarism system. The uniqueness of our coursework meets the necessary requirements of your university
OffersData.question_10_1: How can I contact the author?
OffersData.description_10_1: For a more convenient and high-quality service, we provide a manager who will accompany your order and answer all questions.

OffersData.description_10_2: Yes, we can provide the company and data for the research in this work

OffersData.description_10_3: Our services are provided by experienced professionals. The experts in our professional team of authors have years of experience and offer customers around the world original content at affordable prices.

OffersData.description_10_4: Our services are provided by experienced professionals. The experts in our professional team of authors have years of experience and offer customers around the world original content at affordable prices.

OffersData.question_12_1: I don't have a plan and I don't know the requirements.
OffersData.description_12_1: We will make a plan. Our experts know the standard requirements for all types of work.
OffersData.question_12_2: Will the cost of work not change after subscription?
OffersData.description_12_2: No, the negotiated cost of the work will not change.
OffersData.question_12_3: Can I view the work before paying?
OffersData.description_12_3: Yes, you will have access to an introductory clip. You can familiarize yourself with it before making the full payment.
OffersData.question_12_4: What if the teacher asks for corrections?
OffersData.description_12_4: We make corrections for free during the month in any number. After the warranty expires, we will also make any necessary repairs, but at an additional cost.
OffersData.question_13_1: Is it legal to order student works to order?
OffersData.description_13_1: Our company complies with all requirements and laws regarding the ordering of student works. We provide consulting and writing services for educational purposes, and our clients use the received works themselves. We do not condone any violation of academic integrity or laws.
OffersData.question_13_2: How is my order kept private?
OffersData.description_13_2: We guarantee complete confidentiality of your order. All data and information you provide remains confidential. Our authors sign a non-disclosure agreement and we do not disclose any personal information without your consent.
OffersData.question_13_3: How do I choose the right author for my order?
OffersData.description_13_3: We have a team of qualified authors with different specializations. When placing an order, you can specify your requirements and wishes, and we will select the author that best suits your task.
OffersData.question_13_4: Do you have a guarantee for the quality of the work?
OffersData.description_13_4: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our works. If you have comments or need to make changes, we will gladly listen to you and make the necessary corrections free of charge. Your satisfaction is our priority.
OffersData.question_14_1: How do we determine the prices for custom student works?
OffersData.description_14_1: The price for student works is formed taking into account such factors as the volume of work, level of complexity, deadlines and type of task. Our team uses a transparent pricing system and we always try to provide fair and competitive prices for our customers.
OffersData.question_14_2: How do we ensure high quality of work?
OffersData.description_14_2: We only work with experienced and qualified writers who have the appropriate experience and education. All works undergo a mandatory process of checking for plagiarism and quality before sending to the client. Our team is always ready to make changes and improve the work according to your requirements.
OffersData.question_14_3: How do we keep orders and customer data confidential?
OffersData.description_14_3: We strictly adhere to the principles of confidentiality. All personal data and information related to the order are stored in secure systems and are not disclosed to any third party. All our authors also sign a confidentiality agreement.
OffersData.question_14_4: How quickly can we fulfill an order?
OffersData.description_14_4: The terms of execution depend on the level of complexity of the task and its volume. We recommend placing orders in advance, but we can also carry out work in severe urgent situations. We usually try to set realistic and convenient deadlines for our customers, taking into account their needs.
OffersData.question_15_1: What are the advantages of ordering student works from your company?
OffersData.description_15_1: Our company has many years of experience in the field of providing student works to order. We offer high-quality services, a guarantee of confidentiality and the uniqueness of each work. Our authors are highly qualified professionals who will help you achieve success in your educational goals.
OffersData.question_15_2: Do you have a guarantee of the uniqueness of the works?
